entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers and flurries beginning this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
